A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It’s fantastic. Any negative reviews are just fanboys not getting the same old formula they expect. It goes in completely unexpected directions and is such a unique addition to the saga. It’s fresh\, original\, exciting\, emotional\, it’s simply fantastic. How it’s getting worse reviews than Force Awakens is stunning. I’ve been a die hard fan my whole life and Force Awakens was nothing but a remake of A New Hope that did noting but pander to fans. The Last Jedi is beautiful.
